title: Kai Xuan
author: Kai Xuan
content: Right now, I am playing slots in BK8 with my online friends. The slots event is called Spacegaming Jackpot. The prize is super good.

comments.author: John Tami
comments.body: Where? Is it an online game?

comments.author: Han Keong
comments.body: BK8 yea. The bonus slot event. That's good

comments.author: Lenny Lau
comments.body: I love slots. The event sounds fun

comments.author: John Tami
comments.body: How much prize money you can get if you win?

comments.author: Kai Xuan
comments.body: Well you can win about RM 2million plus if you win.

comments.author: Lenny Lau
comments.body: That's a lot of money.     I can try to win it

comments.author: Han Keong
comments.body: You need lucky bro.  It's not easy to win

comments.author: Kai Xuan
comments.body: You can play the slot just RM4 for each pull. It pretty cheap.

comments.author: Lenny Lau
comments.body: That's right but I can try   Wow that's cheap

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: Whether it is online or offline game.?
